title: (Fri Early Bird) Is Amy A Cool Mom: Fun Fact Friday: Psychological Reason Behind Your Favorite Song + Mailbag:  Is it wrong to Gift 6th grade Teacher Wine?
itunes:title: (Fri Early Bird) Is Amy A Cool Mom: Fun Fact Friday: Psychological Reason Behind Your Favorite Song + Mailbag:  Is it wrong to Gift 6th grade Teacher Wine?
description:
We debate whether or not Amy is a cool mom because she claims to be after bringing up a story in her pile. In Fun Fact Friday, the reason that your favorite song is your favorite. Inside the mailbag, Bobby helps a listener with an end of the year gift for their kid’s teacher…she wants to know if wine is acceptable.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
